title: mathA srI raajaraajEshwari
sahitya:
mAtA shrI rAjarAjEshwari  (jagan)
nIdAsuDanu kAvavE  trilOka 

anupallavi

sadA shiva shankari kowmAri
AdAra nAda vA shankari  jagan

caraNam

japa tapa yOgi muni hrudaya sadanI!
ibha mukha gaNanAtha jananI!
shubhakara shrI satya nArAyaNi!
kapilEswara kshEtra nivAsini gowri!
